metadata.title: CVE-2016-5033 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
The print_exprloc_content function in libdwarf before 20160923 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via acrafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507+git20160523.9086738-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507+git20160523.9086738-1').
